This is a tutorial (worked examples and exercises) demonstrating use of the profileApply() function from the **R** package <i>aqp</i>.

http://ncss-tech.github.io/AQP/demos/profileApply/loafercreek.html

It loads a dataset, called `loafercreek` from the **R** package `soilDB`. 

The analysis is supported by the package `sharpshootR`. These packages are in large part developed by Dylan Beaudette, but there now are many contributors within NCSS.

Loafercreek the dataset is a collection of mostly moderately deep Ultic Haploxeralfs on metavolcanic rock from the CA630 soil survey area (parts of Calaveras and Tuolumne Counties.
